item.title: SWN
item.description: score:27 Chances: Southwestern Energy’s Q4 earnings were positively impacted by higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases. The company’s strong cash flow in 2023, despite lower commodity prices, indicates resilience in the face of market fluctuations. Rising gas futures and potential increase in U.
